synopsis.text: Shoka's Huey Anthony Disward and Dalian embark on a mission to retrieve a Phantom Book, leading them to a secluded hamlet plagued by unexplained disappearances. Their journey takes them to the estate of Sergeant Callavos, where speculations suggest the presence of the elusive book. Teaming up with a local herbalist, Thalia, they delve deeper into the village's enigmatic affairs. Despite reports of Callavos and his family perishing in a devastating fire half a year ago, sightings of his daughter, Florence, in the adjacent forest have surfaced, sparking suspicions of her involvement in the inferno. Determined to unravel the truth, Huey and Dalian venture to the manor, unearthing secrets shrouded in a tangled web of past events. This original anime episode, included with the fifth volume of Chako Abeno's Dantalian no Shoka manga adaptation, promises a captivating journey filled with intrigue and revelations.
synopsis.author: mistral.mistral-large-2402-v1:0
